_sText:
Name : aim_PeRFecT_1
Author : Jb (KILLERSPREE.css@gmail.com)
Site : http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/games/2
Version : 3
Spawnpoints : 32
Base : aim_ak-colt

French map's for training with perfect optimization!
Buy of weapon authorized.

====================================================
Update in version 3 :
- Finalization of optimization.
- Heights of block reduced.
- Additions of boosts.
- Additions of pieces of blocks.
- Camera of beginning added.
- Improved lighting.
- Addition of a width for large the walls.
- Addition of possibilities to climb.
- Height of the sky increased.
- Equipment given automatically.
- Some spawnpoints turned.
- Map rename.

Update in version 2 :
- Change of textures.
- Additions of ideas.
- Improvements of optimization.
====================================================

Special thanks for :
- Hamster for its beautiful textures!
- Jhoud for its ideas on the colors!
- And others for their opinions!
